comment.author: 7471115@N08
comment._content: Looks like a "scout cruiser" of the Chester class, so either USS Chester CL-1, USS Birmingham CL-2, or USS Salem CL-3. They were launched in 1907, and ultimately scrapped in 1930.

comment.author: 22968943@N05
comment._content: Given how often Wikipedia claims Salem was in and out of commission, and a lack of mention of participating in reviews in their description of Birmingham that would seem to suggest Chester herself.

comment.author: 22968943@N05
comment._content: But then a little more googling finds: www.geocities.com/scs028a/1912List.html which lists all three of them :)

comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: a completely documented account of this! either 12:30 and 12:50 PM Monday October 14, 1912 query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9D02E4DD133CE6...
